actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The tlincalli makes two attacks: one with its longsword or spiked chain, and one with its sting.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Spiked Chain
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 11) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

actions.name: Sting
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6 damage) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
